about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, AKM Lace & Embrotex Ltd (AKM) is engaged in the business of manufacturing and trading of all types of embrotex goods, laces, fabrics, clothing, wearing apparel for personal, commericial and industrial use.

AKM’s sale model is divided into two parts, i.e. sale of traded goods which comprises of cotton fabrics, grey cloth, etc and sale of manufactured/processed goods, which comprises of knitted fabrics primarily lace based. For the year ended March 31, 2017 they traded and manufactured goods constituted 73.08% and 26.92% respectively of the total revenue from operations. Company’s products are mostly used in the manufacture of apparels such as sarees, shirtings, suitings, and upholstery such as curtains among others. Company purchases the traded goods from the local suppliers and manufacturers and sells the same to small scale traders.

contactDetails.full_address: AKM Lace & Embrotex Ltd, IX/6024 Ram Gali, Subhash Mohalla, Gandhi Nagar - Delhi - 110031

faqs.question: What is the AKM Lace IPO?
faqs.answer:
AKM Lace IPO is a SME IPO of 1902000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.76 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹25 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on September 20, 2017, and closes on September 22, 2017.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in AKM Lace IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in AKM Lace IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in AKM Lace IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in AKM Lace IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'AKM Lace IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When AKM Lace IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The AKM Lace IPO opens on September 20, 2017 and closes on September 22, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of AKM Lace IPO?
faqs.answer: AKM Lace IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,50,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for AKM Lace IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in AKM Lace IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
